name: one
definition: The default numeral for one (1). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: two
definition: The natural number two (2). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: three
definition: The natural number three (3). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: four
definition: The default numeral for four (4). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: five
definition: The default numeral for five (5). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: six
definition: The natural number six (6). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.
burmese: ခြောက်ခဲ့သည်

name: seven
definition: The natural number seven (7). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: eight
definition: The natural number eight (8). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: nine
definition: The default numeral for nine (9). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: ten
definition: The default numeral for ten (10). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: 1 n sg excl
definition: Exclusive form of the non-singular and non-dual pronominal stem. This should only be filled out for languages which have a suppletive clusivity distinction.
burmese: ကျွန်တစ်ဦးတည်းနှင့်တကွ

name: 1 n sg incl
definition: Inclusive form of the non-singular and non-dual pronominal stem. This should only be filled out for languages which have a suppletive clusivity distinction.

name: 1 sg
definition: The first-person singular pronominal stem, typically a reflex of PTB *ŋa or *ka.

name: 2 n sg
definition: Second person non-singular pronominal stem. This will not likely have a suppletive dual counterpart.

name: 2 sg
definition: The second-person singular pronominal stem, typically but not always a reflex of *naŋ.

name: 3 n sg
definition: Third person non-singular pronominal stem, unmarked for gender. If gendered forms are attested they should be added under separate concepts.

name: 3 sg
definition: Third person singular pronominal stem. This may in some cases also be one of the demonstrative stems, as is the case in much of Bodo-Garo.

name: brewed alcohol
definition: A fermented drink is a beverage containing alcohol because of a metabolic process that converts sugar to acids, gases and/or alcohol (e.g. beer or wine).

name: ant (general)
definition: Any of the black, red, brown, or yellow insects of the family Formicidae characterized by a large head and by living in organized colonies.
burmese: ပုရွက်ဆိတ်

name: ash
definition: The powdery incombustible residue left after the burning of a substance. Additional terms for different types of ash may be present, such as the stringy ash left over from burning dry bamboo. This concept is only for the most basic powdery type, but other forms should be documented as such.

name: bamboo
definition: A group of woody perennial evergreen plants in the true grass family Poaceae, subfamily Bambusoideae, tribe Bambuseae.

name: bat (animal)
definition: A small, flying mammal in the order Chiroptera with wings consisting of skin stretched over a framework of bones, typically active at night.

name: bee (general)
definition: Any pollenating flying insect belonging to the Anthophila clade within the order Hymenoptera. Typically having yellow and black colouring with a striped pattern on the abdoment.

name: bird (general term)
definition: Any of the bipedal, warm-blooded vertebrates that lay eggs having wings which, for most species, enables them to fly.
burmese: ငှက်၊ ယေဘူယျ

name: blood
definition: A fluid connective tissue consisting of the plasma and cells that circulate in the blood vessels.

name: bone
definition: Any of the components of an endoskeleton, consisting mainly of calcium phosphate, collagen and cells.

name: bridge
definition: A structure that spans and provides a passage over a road, railway, river, or some other obstacle.

name: chili pepper
definition: Any fruit of a plant of the botanical genus Capsicum, noted for their spicy and burning flavour due to presence of capsaicin.
burmese: ငရုတ်သီးမှုန့်

name: cloud (rain)
definition: A visible mass of condensed water vapor floating in the atmosphere, typically high above the ground.

name: to be black
definition: Of the very darkest color owing to the absence of or complete absorption of light, the opposite of white.

name: to be red
definition: A color resembling the hue of blood, fire, or a ripe tomato.

name: to be white
definition: A color characterized by the presence of all wavelengths of visible light, often associated with purity or innocence.

name: to die
definition: To cease to live.

name: to dig
definition: To move earth, rocks, etc. out of the way, usually to create a hole.

name: to dream
definition: To experience a series of images, thoughts, and sensations during sleep, often accompanied by emotions and creating a sense of reality.
burmese: အိပ်မက်မက်ဖို့

name: to drink
definition: To consume a liquid through the mouth.

name: eye
definition: The organ that is sensitive to light, which it converts to electrical signals passed to the brain, by which means animals and humans see.

name: father
definition: A male parent.

name: finger
definition: One of the long extremities of the hand that is used for gripping objects.

name: fire
definition: The state of combustion in which inflammable material burns, producing heat, flames and often smoke.

name: flower
definition: The reproductive structure of angiosperm plants, consisting of stamens and carpels surrounded by petals and sepals all borne on the receptacle.

name: to fly
definition: To move autonomously through the air, without any part of the object or object's enclosure touching anything attached to the ground.
burmese: ပျံသန်းရန်

name: fruit
definition: The sweet and fleshy product of a tree or other plant that contains seed and can be eaten as food.

name: ginger
definition: A herbaceous perennial which grows annual stems about a meter tall bearing narrow green leaves and yellow flowers.

name: to give
definition: To transfer the possession or holding (of an object) to another person.

name: hand (arm)
definition: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).

name: head
definition: The part of the body of an animal or human which contains the brain, mouth and main sense organs.

name: heart
definition: A muscular organ that pumps blood through the body.

name: to be heavy
definition: Of a physical object, having great weight.

name: horn (of animal)
definition: A hard growth of keratin that protrudes from the top of the head of certain animals.

name: house
definition: A building for human habitation, especially one that is lived in by a family or small group of people.

name: iron
definition: A malleable ductile silvery-white ferromagnetic metallic element with symbol Fe and atomic number 26, occurring principally in haematite and magnetite. It is widely used for structural and engineering purposes.

name: language
definition: A system of communication using the spoken or signed word or using symbols that represent words, signs or sounds.

name: terrestrial leech
definition: Segmented worms that belong to the phylum Annelida and comprise the subclass Hirudinea.

name: foot
definition: The part of a human’s body below the ankle that is used in order to stand and walk.

name: to be lightweight
definition: With a small mass, little weight or density; the opposite of heavy.
burmese: ပေါ့ပါးစေရန်

name: louse
definition: A small wingless parasitic insect of the order Phthiraptera that lives on humans, other mammals and birds.

name: moon
definition: A natural satellite of a planet.

name: mother
definition: A woman who has at least one child.

name: nose
definition: The organ of the face used to breath and smell.

name: person (human)
definition: A human being.

name: pig (general)
definition: A common, four-legged animal (Sus scrofa) that has cloven hooves, bristles and a nose adapted for digging and is farmed by humans for its meat.

name: cooking pot
definition: A vessel used for cooking or storing food or liquids.
burmese: ဟင်းချက်အိုး

name: cooked rice
definition: Rice that has been prepared by boiling or steaming until it is soft and edible.

name: to be ripe
definition: To be fully developed or mature, and ready to be eaten or used.

name: river
definition: A stream of water which flows in a channel from high ground to low ground and ultimately to a lake or the sea, except in a desert area where it may dwindle away to nothing.

name: root (tree)
definition: The absorbing and anchoring organ of a vascular plant; it bears neither leaves nor flowers and is usually subterranean.

name: salt
definition: A crystalline substance consisting of sodium and chlorine, used for seasoning or preserving food, or for a variety of other industrial and household purposes.

name: seed
definition: A mature fertilized plant ovule, consisting of an embryo and its food store surrounded by a protective seed coat (testa).

name: to shoot (arrow)
definition: To fire a shot from a firearm, bow or other weapon.

name: to be short (length)
definition: Small in length by comparison.
burmese: အတိုအရှည်ဖြစ်ရမည်။

name: to sit
definition: To be in a position with the upper body upright and the legs resting.

name: skin
definition: The tissue forming the outer covering of the vertebrate body: it consists of two layers, the outermost of which may be covered with hair, scales, feathers, etc. It is mainly protective and sensory in function.

name: to sleep
definition: To rest in a state of decreased consciousness and reduced metabolism.

name: smoke
definition: An aerosol, consisting of visible particles and gases, produced by the incomplete burning of carbon-based materials, such as wood and fossil fuels.

name: snake
definition: Any reptile of the suborder Serpentes, typically having a scaly cylindrical limbless body, fused eyelids, and a jaw modified for swallowing large prey.

name: spear
definition: a long, stabbing weapon for thrusting or throwing, consisting of a wooden shaft to which a sharp-pointed head, as of iron or steel, is attached.

name: to stand (in place)
definition: To assume an upright position on one's feet, often with the intention of remaining stationary for a period of time.

name: star
definition: A luminous celestial body that is made from gases (particularly hydrogen and helium) and forms the shape of a sphere.

name: stone
definition: A hard, naturally occurring mineral material often used for building, sculpture, or paving.

name: sun
definition: The particular star at the centre of our solar system, from which the Earth gets light and heat.

name: tail
definition: The appendage of an animal that is attached to its posterior and near the anus.

name: thorn
definition: A sharp, pointed projection on the stem or branch of a plant, developed as a form of defence from grazing animals.

name: thunder
definition: The large booming sound in the sky during storms, as caused by lightning heating the air around it to a very high temperature, causing it to rapidly expand and contract.

name: tiger
definition: Panthera tigris. A large, carnivorous feline with distinctive orange and black stripes. This concept may be understood by speakers as any large cat belonging to the genus Panthera, so care must be taken to avoid ambiguity.

name: tomorrow
definition: The day after the present day.

name: tongue
definition: The flexible muscular organ in the mouth that is used to move food around, for tasting and that is moved into various positions to modify the flow of air from the lungs in order to produce different sounds.

name: tree
definition: Any large woody perennial plant with a distinct trunk giving rise to branches or leaves at some distance from the ground.

name: to be unripe
definition: Of a fruit or vegetable that has not yet fully developed.

name: village
definition: A small community of houses and other buildings, typically in a rural area, often organised under unified leadership and identifiable as a community.

name: to vomit
definition: To forcefully expel the contents of one's stomach through the mouth, often as a result of illness or the ingestion of harmful substances.

name: to walk
definition: To move from one place to another by moving legs alternately, so that at least one foot is in contact with the floor or surface at any one time.
burmese: လမ်းလျှောက်ရန်

name: water
definition: Common liquid (H₂O) which forms rain, rivers, the sea, etc., and which makes up a large part of the bodies of organisms.

name: to weave (fabric)
definition: To create a fabric by interlacing threads.

name: to weep (cry)
definition: To shed tears in response to an emotional state, such as sadness, pain, or happiness.

name: wind
definition: The natural movement of the air, especially in the form of a current blowing from a particular direction.

name: wing
definition: The appendage of a bird or insect used for flying or gliding, typically consisting of a thin, lightweight membrane stretched over a framework of bones or cartilage.

name: year
definition: The time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).

name: yesterday
definition: The day before today.
